description:
It`s a clash no one was expecting when Ekoda-chan is forced to take on an array of invaders in apartment, brought to you by Yonetani Yoshitomo (Gaogaigar, Food Wars) and Shishido Rumi (Tales of Innocence, Xenosaga).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Yonetani Yoshitomo x Shishido Rumi
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 5 - Yonetani Yoshitomo x Shishido Rumi
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 米たにヨシトモ x 宍戸留美
